title: Speaker sounds bass heavy/ sounds normal again when hitting pause and play
content:
When playing a YouTube video or any kind of media the Videos audio sounds very bass heavy and just awful.

Then hit pause wait a second a two and then play again and the sound changes to a more balanced sound.

This might not occur every time when you start a video and it also might take one or two tries to fix it. But this is just a workaround. This
 Has nothing to do with the hardware imo, I got a replacement device - same issue
